text: John Tomlin (1882 – 1941) was an Irish professional footballer who played as a defender for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1882 births Category:1941 deaths Category:People from County Kildare Category:Irish association footballers (before 1923) Category:Association football defenders Category:Seaham White Star F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:Murton Red Star F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Jack Tomlin
